title: Why the US Sells Weapons to 103 Countries
description:
The Global Arms Trade, Mapped
Watch my videos ad-free on Nebula (along with tons of other exclusive videos from fascinating creators). Sign up & get a 40% discount HERE: https://nebula.tv/johnnyharris

For more context on how the arms trade affects conflicts worldwide, watch this Modern Conflicts episode exclusively on Nebula: https://nebula.tv/videos/reallifelore-modern-conflicts-the-yemen-civil-war
Check SEARCH PARTY with Sam Ellis:  https://youtube.com/@Search-Party
WATCH PART 1: https://youtu.be/d-gjsTh4cQg?si=jtw08CoBDCGOA_hm

Final High Res Map Here: https://www.dropbox.com/scl/fi/unmamivuvd4syaoq41gtl/ARMS-TRADE-ORANGE.pdf?rlkey=j9c7jozzkdmxxac8ibonjnmbz&e=1&dl=0

The United States sends weapons to over 100 countries as a way of wielding influence over global affairs today. Those countries rely on the arms trade to help prevent conflicts - but it can just as easily fuel them.
